articles.author: Melissa Mackay
articles.title: Former professional cricketer Aaron Summers jailed for grooming, possessing child abuse material
articles.description: The former Big Bash League player, who used social media to solicit sexually explicit material from children over several months, has been sentenced to at least two years in jail.
articles.content:
A convicted child groomer saved sexually explicit images of children to blackmail them, a court has heard.
  • Aaron Summers will spend at least two years behind bars
  • He pleaded guilty i… [+2941 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
